product_name: CatEye Nima Bike Light - Front/Rear Combo - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Nima lights' semitransparent casing yields greater side visibility and clarity while the heavy-duty hardware mounts in seconds to handlebars or seat post for secure visibility ride after ride.
short_description: The Nima lights' semitransparent casing yields greater side visibility and clarity while the heavy-duty hardware mounts in seconds to handlebars or seat post for secure visibility ride after ride.
